data.title: Rio Tinto Alcan Inc. (Rio Tinto Alcan)
data.meta_description: Rio Tinto Alcan is a Canadian aluminum producer formed at the end of 2007 when Alcan and Rio Tinto Aluminium joined forces. Rio Tinto Alcan, a subsidiary of multinational resources group Rio Tinto, is a global supplier of bauxite, alumina and primary aluminum....
data.text: Get all the information about Rio Tinto Alcan Inc. (Rio Tinto Alcan), a company operating mainly in the Mining & Metals sector. Connect with its key contacts, projects, shareholders, related news and more. The company has operations in Canada, which include Metals processing, smelting, refining and metal products , Alumina / Aluminum, Industrial Contracting and Mining Companies. Write to us at info@bnamericas.com or call us at +56 (2) 29410300 to schedule a demonstration of our platform.
